Text.Page:
Mission Orders:

The {@LinkCreature:10#8#naga battlemasters} are gathering on Kerozen Isle for an unknown purpose.

Make sure that purpose never comes to fruition, then report to Edine at the Beachhead.
No naga like a dead naga. Good work, <PCNAME>.
We're counting on you, <PCNAME>. If the nagas hatch enough battlemasters, they can push us back into the sea.
